languages.text: {n}Ульфар весело смеется.{/n} "За дело! А ты, эттфатер, не зевай и, может, догонишь нас!"
{n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар весело смеется.{/n} "За дело! А ты, эттфатер, не зевай и, может, догонишь нас!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"
{n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"
{n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"
{n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"
{n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"
{n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"

languages.text: {n}乌尔法真诚地大笑起来。{/n}“那我们可有得忙了！别磨蹭了，狼领，不然你该追不上我们了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法真诚地大笑起来。{/n}“那我们可有得忙了！别磨蹭了，狼领，不然你该追不上我们了！”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar rit de bon cœur.{/n} « Nous avons du pain sur la planche, alors ! Ne traînez pas, aett-vater ; vous réussirez peut-être à nous rattraper ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar rit de bon cœur.{/n} « Nous avons du pain sur la planche, alors ! Ne traînez pas, aett-vater ; vous réussirez peut-être à nous rattraper ! »

languages.text: {n}ウルファーが大声で笑う。{/n}「それならやることが山積みだ！ぐずぐずするな、アエット＝ヴァテル。そうすればいつか俺たちに追いつけるかもしれないぞ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーが大声で笑う。{/n}「それならやることが山積みだ！ぐずぐずするな、アエット＝ヴァテル。そうすればいつか俺たちに追いつけるかもしれないぞ！」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar ríe a carcajada limpia.{/n} «¡Pues tenemos trabajo por delante! Dese prisa, Aett-Vater, y tal vez pueda alcanzarnos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar ríe a carcajada limpia.{/n} «¡Pues tenemos trabajo por delante! Dese prisa, Aett-Vater, y tal vez pueda alcanzarnos!».

languages.text: {n}Ulfar lacht herzhaft.{/n} "Dann haben wir einiges zu tun! Zaudert nicht, Aett-Vater, dann holt Ihr uns vielleicht ein!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar laughs heartily.{/n} "Then we have work to do! Do not dally, Aett-Vater, and you might just catch up to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar lacht herzhaft.{/n} "Dann haben wir einiges zu tun! Zaudert nicht, Aett-Vater, dann holt Ihr uns vielleicht ein!"
